item.description:
November 1970, an auction of Egyptian antiquities brings together the cream of the art world, in a hotel in the Swiss Alps.

The centerpiece: a statuette of the goddess Bastet.

But the day before the sale, everything rushes. A snowstorm prevents all communication with the outside world, a jazz concert takes an unexpected turn, tensions arise, not to mention the threat of an ancestral curse.

In the atmosphere of a luxury hotel, you will go in search of evidence. Thanks to a wallet of Swiss francs, you can buy certain information (staff testimonials, translation of certain documents, access to certain rooms or documents of the hotel), and even search the rooms of suspects!

During your investigation, you will have to solve puzzles and decrypt coded messages in collaborative mode to access additional clues.

This will allow many interactions between the players and will spice up the evening even more because the culprit will have to discreetly defeat this mission, without being unmasked.

Contents:
6 character booklets including press articles, map of the hotel, tickets, biography, agenda, advice and tips, etc...
 
1 organization booklet including:
- a notice & advice section
- an outcome and solution part
 30 large-format cards (testimonials, clues, search of the hotel, chapters of history)
 
1 guide for the perfect investigator
 
1 mini Art'cheo magazine
 
Access to the collaborative mission section on our website.

-translated from Kickstarter campaign

---

Novembre 1970, une vente aux enchères d'antiquités égyptiennes réunit tout le gratin du monde de l'art, dans un hôtel des Alpes suisses.

La pièce maîtresse : une statuette de le déesse Bastet.

Mais la veille de la vente, tout se précipite. Une tempête de neige empêche toute communication avec l'extérieur, un concert de jazz prend une tournure inattendue, des tensions se dessinent, sans oublier la menace d'une malédiction ancestrale.

Dans La Malédiction de Bastet, tous les invités sont suspects mais leur identité est confidentielle.

Vous incarnerez des personnages venus des 4 coins du monde.

Un homme, britannique et élégant

Un femme, franco-égyptienne et romancière

Un homme, égyptien et ambitieux

Une femme, suisse et émotive

Un homme, suisse et opportuniste

Une femme, égyptienne, froide et hautaine
